body:
please report the issue template: https://raw.github.com/owncloud/core/master/issue_template.md

do you also have a screenshot of the 2 gb displayed in the ui ?
does the size also appear as 2 gb when accessing it through webdav ?

i also have this bug.
webdav shows 0 byte size for such files bigger than 2gb. webdav does not show a directory size. 
using mysql 5.5.25
![screenshot](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/6232639/1793610/da4b4f04-69b5-11e3-8736-cb87198c9619.png)
![screenshot 2](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/6232639/1793624/4e07d2c8-69b6-11e3-8279-23baae26c8dd.png)
actually the file is more than 3gb

@bernic @windaishi thanks a lot for reporting issues back to us!

we need some more information to properly support you with your issue!

can i ask you to follow our guidelines for submitting bugs as described here: https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md

thanks a lot!

what exactly do you need? unfortunately i cant tell you how to reproduce, but it happened to me on 2 different systems, both owncloud 6.0.0a, windows, mysql 5.5.25, php 5.4.22 and apache 2.2 or apache 2.4.
neither the owncloud log nor webservers or mysql log shows something interessting, but i can post it anyway

also note that the synchronising client on windows 8 reports that i only use 2g out of the 500gb .
when uploding more files 2g remains constant, instead the 500gb decrease. so after i uploaded 75gb of data it reports i have used 2gb out of 425 gb
